title: David Chang Chows Down With Chrissy Teigen In 1st ‘Breakfast, Lunch & Dinner’ Trailer
text:
Thanks for signing up!

Cool as hell top chef David Chang has a new original series coming to Netflix this month. It’s called Breakfast, Lunch & Dinner, and he pretty much travels the world eating delicious food with his celebrity mates.

In each episode, Chang accompanied by a different celebrity guest explore a single city, its culture, and its cuisine. Chuck in some banter and some solid D&Ms, and you’ve got me hook, line, and sinker.

The season 1 guests are Seth Rogen, Chrissy Teigen, Lena Waithe, and Kate McKinnon. That’s four episodes all up.

In Rogen’s episode, they head to the actor’s hometown of Vancouver for a personal tour of Rogen’s childhood hits, including dim sum and doughnuts. Also, weed.

With Teigen, the pair travel to Marrakech to suss out the queen’s fave Moroccan holiday spots, feat. markets, pottery, and wholesome food.

In Los Angeles, Chang and Waithe explore the city’s subcultures, from the East to the West. And with McKinnon, Chang heads to Phnom Penh to learn about Cambodia’s history… and to eat a lot of noodles.

Breakfast, Lunch & Dinner hits Netflix, October 23. It looks very good.

In the meantime, you can catch Chang in his Netflix series Ugly Delicious. 10/10 recommend. He also features in Jon Favreau‘s completely random but amusing cooking series The Chef Show, an extension of Chef. And, Chang also appears in Christina Tosi‘s episode of Chef’s Table.

You can suss all of these on Netflix.
description: Cool as hell top chef David Chang has a new original series coming to Netflix this month. It's called Breakfast, Lunch & Dinner.
